### Slots

| Slot       | Description                                   |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| `"avatar"` | Used to add an avatar to the profile pattern. |
| `"icon"`   | Used to add an icon to the profile pattern.   |
| `"name"`   | Used to add the name to the profile pattern.  |
